name: Krieg gegen den Tod - War on Death
name_original: Krieg gegen den Tod - War on Death
description:
Typical FPS that would have been a lot better if I had not crashed my UI on day 7 of a 10 day Game Jam which means the mortar I had setup wouldn't work! Had to give it to the AI and now you attack the mortar instead.

Dealing with bugs is like the 5 stages of grief:

  • Denial - maybe it's not really a problem.
  • Anger - at the bug, yourself, your stupid code.
  • Bargaining - if I only do this, it will work!
  • Depression - it won't work, I'm running out of time .
  • Acceptance - do something else. It'll be fine!

Standard game play WASD movement, left mouse-click  to shoot, right zoom-in, yada-yada-yada.

Has some fun moments, a bit of blood splatter (red mist), and a joke if you complete the game.
